text: John Dean Lewis Burkinshaw (12 May 1890 – 1947) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1947 deaths Category:People from Kilnhurst Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Kilnhurst Colliery F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Rotherham Town F.C. title: Jack Burkinshaw
